startingGrid.notes: Note - Stroll, Ricciardo penalised five grid places for unscheduled gearbox changes.
Note - Grosjean, Palmer penalised five grid places for failing to slow for double waved yellow flags in qualifying. Giovinazzi penalised five places for an unscheduled gearbox change.
Note - Sainz penalised three grid places for causing a collision at the previous round. Vandoorne penalised 15 places for use of additional power unit elements.
Note - Vandoorne penalised 10 places for use of additional power unit elements.
